llm_decision.raw:
LANGUAGE: Hindi
TRANSCRIPTION: बाई और को एक बुरा रास्ता है
CONFIDENCE: medium
REASONING: Whisper's "बाई और को एक बुप तरास्ता हैं" is close but has a spelling error ("बुप" instead of "बुरा"). MMS-ZeroShot-Constrained's "बैन और को एक बुक रास्ता है" has a similar error ("बैन" instead of "बाई"). MMS-1B's "तुम्हारे पास तीन महीने बच्चे हैं" is unrelated to the context. OmniASR's transcription is in Urdu, not Hindi. Therefore, I combined the correct words from Whisper and MMS-ZeroShot-Constrained to get the most accurate transcription.
